```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
employed_gender <- read.csv("employed_gender.csv")
gendered_data <- employed_gender |>
  filter(year == 2012) |>
  mutate(
    female_prop = full_time_female/total_full_time,
    male_prop = full_time_male/total_full_time
  )

employee_data <- data.frame(
  category = c("Female Workers", "Male Workers"),
  value = c(gendered_data$female_prop, gendered_data$male_prop)
)

ggplot(employee_data, aes(x = "", y = value, fill = category)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", width = 1) +
  coord_polar(theta = "y") +
  labs(
    x = "",
    y = "Proportion of Workers Out of Total Full Time %",
    title = "Ratio of Male to Female Full-Time Workers in 2010"
  )
```
